extendedInfo.description: Would you like to have fun drawing your celebrities such as Beyonce, Michael Jackson, Lady Gaga, and Brad Pitt? That is exactly what the How to Draw: Celebrities app allows you to do. Add this latest offering in the series of drawing apps and never worry about boredom again!Drawing is fun, but traditionally not so fun to learn. Unless you can afford a private tutor, you usually have to take a class that requires you to adhere to a specific schedule.  The How to Draw: Celebrities app makes learning to draw as easy and as flexible as possible. All you need to provide is the time, medium, and environment in which you want to draw!The How to Draw: Celebrities app includes a collection of tutorials for drawing the most revered celebrities on the planet. Whether you are a fan of musicians, actors, actresses, singers, or even a political figure â your favorite is sure to be available in this app. You can choose one, two, three, or all of the celebrities to draw. The choice is yours!The How to Draw: Celebrities app makes learning to draw a snap by using mimicking, a method of drawing that is ideal for both beginners and advanced artists. Simply follow the step-by-step instructions provided for your selected celebrity. You will learn to draw in no time!âââCELEBRITIESâ ââThe following is a list of more than 35 famous people that you can draw with the How to Draw: Celebrities app:â How to Draw Katy Perryâ How to Draw Will Smithâ How to Draw Cristiano Ronaldoâ How to Draw Johnny Depp		â How to Draw Michael Jacksonâ How to Draw Eminemâ How to Draw Lady Gagaâ How to Draw Justin Bieberâ How to Draw Leonardo DiCaprio		â How to Draw Marilyn Mansonâ How to Draw Beyonceâ How to Draw Madonnaâ How to Draw Lionel Messiâ How to Draw Roger Federer		â How to Draw Shakira	â How to Draw Rihannaâ How to Draw Avril Lavigne		â How to Draw Britney Spearsâ How to Draw Angelina Jolieâ How to Draw Robert Pattinsonâ How to Draw Brad Pittâ How to Draw Adeleâ How to Draw Cameron Diazâ How to Draw Barack Obamaâ How to Draw Miley Cyrusâ How to Draw Bob Marleyâ How to Draw Justin Timberlakeâ How to Draw Akonâ How to Draw Selena Gomezâ How to Draw Megan Foxâ How to Draw Angelina Jolieâ How to Draw Elvis Presleyâ How to Draw Hugh Laurie as Gregory HouseAdded:â How to Draw Al Capone, American gangster â How to Draw Cristiano Ronaldo, famous football playerâ How to Draw Steve Jobs, Apple CEO, iPhone and iPad developerâââFEATURESâââThe following is a list of the features that you can expect with the How to Draw: Celebrities app:â Free to use!â Portable so you can learn to draw wherever you take your mobile device!â One of the largest collections of tutorials for drawing celebrities in a single app!â Easy to follow step-by-step instructions for each tutorial!â Each tutorial associated with a rating so you can choose according to your drawing level!â Navigation controls that allow you to learn at your own pace!Try How to Draw: Celebrities today!

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Pretty good for a free app.  More relevant faces would be a plus.

reviews.comment: I always loved to draw and this is a way to help me get better at it. It really fun you should try it.
